name: Salesforce
comparison_text: Salesforce is powerful, but it's built for giants. BasaltCRM gives you the same predictive AI power without the six-figure price tag or the need for a dedicated admin team.

name: HubSpot
comparison_text: HubSpot gets expensive fast as you grow. BasaltCRM offers unlimited contacts and flat pricing, so your success isn't punished with higher bills.

name: Zoho CRM
comparison_title: A CRM You'll Actually Enjoy Using
comparison_text: Zoho does a lot, but it feels like software from 2010. BasaltCRM offers a modern, beautiful interface that your team will love, not loathe.

name: Pipedrive
comparison_text: Pipedrive is great for visualization, but it lacks the autonomous brain. BasaltCRM doesn't just show you the pipeline; it moves deals through it for you.

name: Monday.com
weakness: Jack of all trades, master of none
comparison_text: Monday is a great project tool, but sales requires specialized intelligence. BasaltCRM is purpose-built for closing deals and supporting customers.

name: Freshsales
comparison_text: Freshsales is simple but rigid. BasaltCRM adapts to your unique workflows with open-source flexibility and unlimited customization.

name: Zendesk Sell
comparison_text: Zendesk Sell is great if you're already on Zendesk, but it's not AI-native. BasaltCRM combines sales and support in one unified AI brain.

name: Microsoft Dynamics 365
comparison_title: Easy to Use, Easy to Scale
comparison_text: Dynamics is powerful but overwhelming. BasaltCRM offers enterprise power with a consumer-grade user experience.

name: Insightly
comparison_text: Insightly's analytics are basic. BasaltCRM gives you predictive insights out of the box, no add-ons required.

name: Copper
comparison_text: Copper locks you into Google Workspace. BasaltCRM integrates with everything: Gmail, Outlook, Slack, and 5000+ apps.

name: ActiveCampaign
comparison_title: Built for Sales, Not Just Marketing
comparison_text: ActiveCampaign is great for email but lacks true sales intelligence. BasaltCRM is purpose-built for revenue growth.

name: Keap (Infusionsoft)
comparison_text: Keap's automation is powerful but manual. BasaltCRM's AI learns and adapts without constant configuration.

name: Nimble
comparison_text: Nimble tracks social but lacks predictive AI. BasaltCRM combines social insights with autonomous deal-closing.

name: Capsule CRM
comparison_text: Capsule is easy but limited. BasaltCRM is just as intuitive with 10x the intelligence under the hood.

name: Less Annoying CRM
comparison_text: Less Annoying is cheap but manual. BasaltCRM automates everything while remaining affordable.

name: Agile CRM
comparison_text: Agile CRM has features but feels bloated. BasaltCRM delivers power with elegance.

name: Close CRM
comparison_text: Close is great for calling but lacks deep analytics. BasaltCRM adds AI-driven forecasting to your outreach.

name: Nutshell
comparison_text: Nutshell is decent but overpriced. BasaltCRM gives you enterprise AI at SME pricing.

name: Streak
comparison_text: Streak lives in Gmail but can't escape it. BasaltCRM works everywhere and integrates with everything.

name: SugarCRM
comparison_text: SugarCRM is open but hard to configure. BasaltCRM is open-source with enterprise-grade setup ease.

name: Vtiger
comparison_text: Vtiger is open but feels old. BasaltCRM combines open-source freedom with cutting-edge design.

name: Bitrix24
comparison_text: Bitrix24 does everything poorly. BasaltCRM does CRM exceptionally well.

name: Ontraport
comparison_title: AI That Works Out of the Box
comparison_text: Ontraport requires a consultant. BasaltCRM's AI works from day one.

name: Pipeliner CRM
comparison_text: Pipeliner visualizes but doesn't predict. BasaltCRM shows you the future, not just the present.

name: Creatio
comparison_text: Creatio is powerful but overkill. BasaltCRM is right-sized for growth-stage companies.
